up late facebookin playing couldve been

thinking what i woulda done different
not a damn thing cause finally im done with it im done
besides i got a girl that adores me

and sing these arms of mine to her shes a otis redding fan
and shell never forget it man
cause she knows shell never find a better man no
lets go ahead with these wedding plans
come on lets sing a song life goes on
